highlights.1: INF.03 Qualification - Creating and managing databases, designing, building, and maintaining websites and web applications.
highlights.2: [May 2026] INF.04 Qualification - Designing, programming, testing advanced web, desktop, and mobile applications to meet user needs.

highlights.1: Created a full-stack web application utilizing Symfony, Doctrine, and Tailwind CSS
highlights.2: Built relational database structures in PostgreSQL with a focus on clean architecture and efficiency

highlights.1: No experience, open to new opportunities

project1.description: Treasure Seeker is an engaging Roblox game created as a contest entry, where players explore a diverse island to uncover hidden treasures. This first major project earned third place, showcasing creativity, teamwork, and efficient time management. The game features custom Blender models by my friend pindvs.

project2.description: TablixVS is an interactive web-based game where users compare values from selected tables to guess which elements have higher values. It supports importing tables via the Spotify API and manual additions, distinguishing between the two sources.

project3.description: Mediarium is a streamlined web app for organizing and browsing media across categories like videos, websites, and music. Users can group entries (pages) into customizable notebooks, add notes, and import content via APIs or manually. Its clean interface and flexible structure make curating media collections easy.

project4.description: Grakh is a narrative RPG set in 17th-century Krak√≥w, built around a system of quests, achievements, and dialogues leading to two possible endings. The project features a conditional quest progression structure, an internal achievement system, and various character interactions, creating a cohesive and narratively diverse experience.
